items.sentence: I\'ll have to take over my father\'s business in the future.
You don\'t seem to have any problem communicating in French.
A time bomb went off in the airport killing thirteen people.
About ten million tons of coal are mined every day in China.
I don\'t care where we eat dinner. It\'s entirely up to you.
I don\'t know what Tom did to the TV, but it\'s working now.
Tom stopped at his grandfather\'s farm on his way to Boston.
It took me a while to understand what she was trying to say.
She was about to go to bed when someone knocked on the door.
Tom knew Mary wasn\'t married, even though she said she was.
